member.name: M:DeviceConnection.NGIOLibrary.getAllConnectedDeviceNames(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Opens a Device List snapshot and returns an array of the names of all devices connected A device can be opened by creating a new Device object with the name
member.param: The type of device you are looking for. Look in the NGIO class for a list of constants
member.returns: An array of strings containing the names of all connected devices

member.name: M:DeviceConnection.NGIOLibrary.openDeviceByName(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Opens the device with the given unique name. The type helps determine if exclusive ownership is necessary
member.param: The unique name given from getAllConnectedDeviceNames()
The type of device needed to be open
member.returns: An open device ready for taking measurements and retreiving sensor data
